Episode #6 When Bolivia Does Democracy Better Than the USA

Breaking News: the Movement for Socialism, (MAS) wins the popular vote by a landslide in Bolivia! Trump and Amy Coney Barret hold american democracy hostage, while the attempt to kidnap the Michigan gov. Whitmey becomes increasingly insane, involving an internet militia with a civil war plot, Bill Gates Vaccine conspiracies, and even nuking the world back to the stone age.

Watch The Episode!
